image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Pennsylvania; born in Erie, Erie County, Pa., December 10, 1957; B. S., Edinboro State College, Edinboro, Pa., 1982; business owner; director, Lake Erie Arboretum at Frontier Park, Pa.; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress (January 3, 2009-January 3, 2011); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010; Erie County, Pa., executive, 2014-present.
